Articles.Content:
Basically the top poster (Poster before you) Says a sentence with blanks, You have to try and complete the sentence with words that make no sense for the sentence he wrote.

For example:

ExampleUSER:

Theres a _ on the _ table

Then you'd reply...

Theres a fire on the cake table

Then you'd make a new sentence with blanks then the chain repeats.

There's a vinyl on the turntable.

Nailed it.

I used to _ but then I _.

I used to be an adventurer like you. But then I took an arrow in the knee.

Lol sorry

I used to live.But then I died.

My one:

I am ___. I ____ stuff.

I am fluffy. I murder stuff.

The _ has been _.

The kraken has been defeated.

I __ rockets.

I crash rockets

I ___ in _______

I frolic in rocketland!

Once I had to ____ a lemon, and as a result, I got to meet _____!

Once I had to destroy a lemon, and as a result, I got to be Luke Skywalker!

I ____ the potato, whilst _____ some liquid fuel

I ate the potato, whilst p*ssing some liquid fuel.

Ahem, sry.

I crashed the potato, whilst using some liquid fuel.

Now, _____ what you _____, because ______ didn't _____.

Now, do what you want, because Jeb didn't die.

Oh ____ yes! ____ land!

Oh F*ck yes! England!

How __ did he get __ f__k ___ eat ___ f___

Howitzer propelled, did he got the orbiting fork to eat french fries?

____! Absurdly _____, nonsensical ______. Don't you ____?

Kerbal Space Program! Absurdly absurd, nonsensical rockets abound. Don't you like space, bruh?

Is this just the _____? Is this just ____? ____ in a _____, no escape from ______.

Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy? Caught in a landslide, no escape from reality. I love this song.

Aheeeem.

Is this just the aerodynamics? Is this just gravity? Caught in a flat spin, no escape from this motion sickness.

Mister ____ bring me a _____. Make it ______ that _____ ever____.

"Mister Picard could you bring me a sandvich?" said the stranger. "Make it so Number 1, he replied". that made every Star trek fan ***** their pants in horror

I____ch k____ac___ were ______am___ done g_____
"I- eergh- ch- k- ac-" Were all the words we heard before the radio cut out completely. "Am I done, Greenman?" He asked.

Filling the invisible blank phrase.

The ___ is on the ___.

The victim is on the Launchpad.

Why is the ___ on ___?

Why is the fire on the bomb. Nailed It.

_______________

Your mom is dead.

Jeb ____ your _____.

Supercalafragalisticexpealadotious purple worms.

Jeb is _____, _____, and bright _____.

Jeb is insane, mad, and bright green.

If you are ___ and you know it, then ___ your ___.

If you are crazy and you know it, then slap your grandma.

"Sir, we don't have enough _______ for the planned _______!"

"Sir, we don't have enough cocktails for the planned party!"

How much ___ could a ___ ___ if that ___ could ___ ___?
